verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> I shall not <S%H2637>want.<s%>
He makes me <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H1877>green<s%> <S%H9318>pastures;<s%> He <S%H5095>leads<s%> me <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H4496>quiet<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
He <S%H7725>restores<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> He <S%H5148>guides<s%> me in the <S%H4570>paths<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> For His name's <S%H4616>sake.<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> I <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9563>evil;<s%> for Thou art with me; Thy <S%H7626>rod<s%> and Thy <S%H4938>staff,<s%> they <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me.

Thou dost <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of my <S%H6887>enemies;<s%> Thou hast <S%H1878>anointed<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> My <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H7310>overflows.<s%>

<S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H9185>goodness<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will <S%H7291>follow<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H9132>life,<s%> And I will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H753>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
